name: Strela
description:
A small puzzle arcade in which you need to hit the target with bouncing arrow.

Controls:

Mouse - aim

LMB - Shoot

R - Reset level

Escape - Exit to main menu

Assets were used:

Music:

  • https://nihilore.itch.io/the-nihilore-collection
  • https://finalgatestudios.itch.io/music-pack-1?download
  • https://sonniss.com/gameaudiogdc2016/

Font:

  •  Paytone One Regular

Game was made for ScoreSpace Jam #10
